basic.floral_language:
Echeveria mebina 
Floriography: lovely, blessed, warm
Echeveria mebina is a small Echeveria with elegant leaves, thick pale green leaves, spectacular, recess in the middle, spiny tip, tightly arranged like an open lotus flower. Leaf edges may show lovely pinkish color under full sunlight.
Echeveria mebina loves sunlight and has no dormant period, but avoid very strong direct sunlight for better care. Sometimes blooms with orang red flowers
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, flowers during spring, orange red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color light green, when sunny leaf color turning to pale pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, no apparent dormancy in summer, shade properly under strong light
maintenance.watering: Do not water frequently, keep a dry environment, water every 10-15 days
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
